arts.ttl: Cremonese aim to continue positive start vs. Parma
arts.sum: In Cremona, there have been 24 matches between the two teams: 9 victories for the grigiorossi (Cremonese), 10 draws, and 5 successes for the Emilian side (Parma). Cremonese, still unbeaten, host a Parma side looking for their first league win of the campaign
